creator: skearns23@yahoo.com
text:
In version 2.0alpha, after deleting all events from a logpanel,
the scroll to bottom function no longer operates.

creator: sdeboy@iname.com
text:
Modified log panel's 'sticky' scroll to bottom logic and tested more thoroughly.

'Sticky' scroll to bottom should now be temporarily deactivated only when  the
bottom row is not selected (clear should no longer deactivate scroll to bottom).
